item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.source: Fun with a boat and ice

item.title: Fun with a boat and ice
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:10, topic:380155”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=475996.msg3481017#msg3481017 date=1296119002]

There was ice, and a little pool area. I went down a waterfall and at the speed I was going, it forced me under the ice but in the water, so it put my head through the ice, and I could breath just fine. Although I could go through any block I wanted while under the ice, except I would suffocate until I moved.
[/quote]Very cool I want to try that sometime

Server’s offline atm, but if it gets back online I can show you.[/quote]I will probably be in bed by then Its 1 am

Read full topic
item.source: Fun with a boat and ice

item.title: Fun with a boat and ice
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:9, topic:380155”][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=475996.msg3481011#msg3481011 date=1296118887]
There was ice, and a little pool area. I went down a waterfall and at the speed I was going, it forced me under the ice but in the water, so it put my head through the ice, and I could breath just fine. Although I could go through any block I wanted while under the ice, except I would suffocate until I moved.
[/quote]Very cool I want to try that sometime[/quote]
Server’s offline atm, but if it gets back online I can show you.

Read full topic

Haha, how did you do that?
[/quote]Took the boat off the diving board on our hotel roof into our water.

Lol I love jumping off that[/quote]XD Yeah it is pretty cool.
